attributes.action: get concorde back in the air for airshows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if they can do the vulcan they can do concorde as the one on static display at heathrow can fly, why cant we have this fantastic airplane in the air...
 the concorde is a very important part of our heritage so please sign up and get the wonderful aircraft back in the air...............

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
